channel.title: CVE Feed for InHand Networks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for InHand Networks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38482|2024-09-17T02:37:04.732Z -- inhand%20networks -- ir615%20router
item.description: InHand Networks IR615 Router's Versions 2.3.0.r4724 and 2.3.0.r4870 website used to control the router is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting, which may allow an attacker to hijack sessions of users connected to the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-21182|2024-09-17T01:26:49.847Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the router configuration import functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.4. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to increased privileges. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26075|2024-09-17T03:02:35.603Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the console infactory_wlan functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.37. A specially-crafted series of network requests can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26085|2024-09-17T01:46:53.613Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd wlscan_ASP functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.4. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-38464|2024-09-17T03:33:36.623Z -- inhand%20networks -- ir615%20router
item.description: InHand Networks IR615 Router's Versions 2.3.0.r4724 and 2.3.0.r4870 have inadequate encryption strength, which may allow an attacker to intercept the communication and steal sensitive information or hijack the session.

item.title: CVE-2022-29481|2024-09-17T04:24:23.501Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: A leftover debug code vulnerability exists in the console nvram functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.45. A specially-crafted series of network requests can lead to disabling security features. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26023|2024-09-17T03:58:53.184Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: A leftover debug code vulnerability exists in the console verify functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.45. A specially-crafted series of network requests can lead to disabling security features. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26002|2024-09-17T04:18:53.154Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the console factory functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.4. A specially-crafted network request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of malicious packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26782|2024-09-17T02:01:02.467Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: Multiple improper input validation vulnerabilities exists in the libnvram.so nvram_import functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.4. A specially-crafted file can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.An improper input validation vulnerability exists in the `httpd`'s `user_define_set_item` function. Controlling the `user_define_timeout` nvram variable can lead to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-38480|2024-09-17T03:13:52.768Z -- inhand%20networks -- ir615%20router
item.description: InHand Networks IR615 Router's Versions 2.3.0.r4724 and 2.3.0.r4870 are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery when unauthorized commands are submitted from a user the web application trusts. This may allow an attacker to remotely perform actions on the routerâ€™s management portal, such as making configuration changes, changing administrator credentials, and running system commands on the router.

item.title: CVE-2022-26420|2024-09-17T00:30:47.228Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the console infactory_port functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.37. A specially-crafted series of network requests can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21238|2024-09-17T03:48:40.508Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: A cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerability exists in the info.jsp functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.4. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-38478|2024-09-17T03:47:35.024Z -- inhand%20networks -- ir615%20router
item.description: InHand Networks IR615 Router's Versions 2.3.0.r4724 and 2.3.0.r4870 are vulnerable to an attacker using a traceroute tool to inject commands into the device. This may allow the attacker to remotely run commands on behalf of the device.

item.title: CVE-2021-38466|2024-09-17T03:12:58.319Z -- inhand%20networks -- ir615%20router
item.description: InHand Networks IR615 Router's Versions 2.3.0.r4724 and 2.3.0.r4870 do not perform sufficient input validation on client requests from the help page. This may allow an attacker to perform a reflected cross-site scripting attack, which could allow an attacker to run code on behalf of the client browser.

item.title: CVE-2022-26518|2024-09-17T03:37:34.013Z -- inhand%20networks -- inrouter302
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the console infactory_net functionality of InHand Networks InRouter302 V3.5.37. A specially-crafted series of network requests can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.
